root.message: The COVERAGE field for indicator 3-3-1, translated into en
root.data:
Data availability:

170 countries in 2020. Data are available by age and sex, however there are methodological challenges in estimating incidence among key populations

Time series:

2000-2019

Disaggregation:

General population, Age groups (0-14, 15-24, 15-49, 50+ years, All ages), sex (male, female, both) Key population data are currently not available as methods are being developed.
